messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Hi, I'm a new patient and I'd like to schedule an appointment.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: You're welcome! I’d like to schedule a general checkup, please.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Got it. Before we can schedule your appointment, would you like to create a demo patient profile? I just need your first and last name to get started.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Sure! My name is Sarah Johnson.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Your patient profile has been created. And your date of birth is July fourth two thousand for demo purposes. How may I help you today?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: I’d like to schedule a general checkup appointment, please.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Thanks, Sarah. For a general checkup, we offer a new patient consultation. Let me check available times for you. Do you have a preferred provider? Day, or time of day?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: I don’t have a preferred provider, but I’d like morning appointments if possible. Any day except Wednesdays works for me.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Got it. I'll look for morning new patient consultation appointments with any provider.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: On any day except Wednesdays. Let me check what's available.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: It looks like there are no morning appointments available this

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: That's okay. Are there any afternoon appointments available?
